messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: unschooling.com
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/19/2004 12:25:19 AM Eastern Daylight Time, DACunefare@aol.com writes: Well, I  had promised to let people know as soon as the message
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/19/2004 12:25:19 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
DACunefare@... writes:

Well, I had promised to let people know as soon as the message boards at
unschooling.com were functional again, but wouldn't you know that the
webmaster
would finally get things fixed on a day I wasn't online at all!?! Sheesh
:) <<<

So what happened, Deb?

After over a month, I figured they were lost forever in cyber-space. Now
they're back up and seem as good as new. What WAS it?

~Kelly






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: unschooling.com
messages.msgSnippet: Well, I had promised to let people know as soon as the message boards at unschooling.com were functional again, but wouldn t you know that the webmaster would
messages.messageBody:
Well, I had promised to let people know as soon as the message boards at
unschooling.com were functional again, but wouldn't you know that the webmaster
would finally get things fixed on a day I wasn't online at all!?! Sheesh :)

Deborah A Cunefare
unschooling.com message boards manager


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: unschooling.com
messages.msgSnippet: I told some people I d let people know when unschooling.com was operational again.  The message boards are up again now.   Anne Ohman announced it on
messages.messageBody:
I told some people I'd let people know when unschooling.com was operational
again. The message boards are up again now. Anne Ohman announced it on
UnschoolingDiscussion.

Sandra
